price: ߒ߬ߓߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߣߵߊ߬ ߢߐ߲߰ ߞߎߡߊ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߥߍ߫ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߕߎ߬ߢߊ߬ߕߌ߯ ߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
